review: This is primarily geared for those that have Amazon Prime. The apps are lacking, but expected. Navigation isn't the best with the controller, but much better using the Fire Tv Kindle App. It will not replace my Roku yet it has a defined purpose for Prime subscribers.
author: Gamer

review: Worked as expected, and then some.  Its not clearly documented, but if you goto settings, display and sounds, and enable screen mirroring, you can cast to this device from any samsung product using Android 4.2 or later.  makes it a chromecast killer, and we love it.  Also has dual band wifi, and better hardware, so no sluggish video.

review: I like it. Fire TV Stick installed easily and works as described. With this, I won't need to use similar functions built into my Blue-Ray player, which connected and buffered slowly. With the Stick's slick interface, I can find content I want and watch it very quickly.
